modName: Paralyze Weapons - Do Quest without Kill
summary: You will get Non Hostile weapons. Best for sneaking fan player. These weapon will paralyze enemy without trigger hostile mode. Enter the dungeon, silence them all and finish the quest without killing enemies.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#e06666][size=5][b]WHEN YOU BORED KILLING PEOPLE, JUST PARALYZE THEM[/b][/size][/color]

[youtube]9KJVkqL8kzc[/youtube]

[youtube]ABpJyJwHGX4[/youtube]
Cool video from [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCSxiWxc620dpLFj4nUt_bqA]Ã†RYS THE MAD DOVAHKING[/url]

[size=4]Ps: Sorry for my grammar, English is not my native language.

Not all dragonborns are killer. Some of them only kill monsters and dragons.
I love to snipe people from a far and put them to sleep before I enter their lair. [/size]

[color=#ffe599][size=4][b]DESCRIPTION:[/b][/size][/color]
[list]
[*][size=4]Add 4 weapons: Bow, Crossbow, Dagger and Sword.[/size]
[*][size=4]All weapons have paralyze effect on them and will last for 360 seconds. You will have enough time to enter a dungeon, put all enemy to sleep and walk out without kill any single human.[/size]
[*][size=4]All weapons are non-hostile, you can shoot or slash any guard without trigger them to hostile mode.[/size]
[*][size=4]Silencer Arrows and bolts are craft-able in weapon forge.[/size]
[/list]
[color=#b6d7a8][size=4][b]LOCATION:[/b][/size][/color][size=4]
Fast travel to Riverwood, you will find a follower with Cultist Mask. Recruit her and take the weapons from her, then you may dismiss her or bring her to your journey.

[color=#6d9eeb][b]UPDATE:[/b][/color]
V1.1
[/size][list]
[*][size=4]Add 2 new weapons : Dagger and Bow.[/size]
[*][size=4]Remove green sphere casting light effect on weapons.[/size]
[/list]

[size=4]Recommended Mod:
[/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58603/][size=4]Loot from paralyzed npc[/size]
[/url]
[color=#f6b26b][b]
[size=4]REQUIREMENTS:[/size][/b][/color][size=4]
Dawnguard DLC
Dragonborn DLC[/size]

[size=4][b]MY OTHER MODS:[/b]
[/size][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/87178]Madlyn Wild - The Mobs Launcher
[/url][/size][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/86207][size=4]Bellania Hunt - The Dragonborn Hunter[/size]
[/url]
author: Steamdante
